channel.title: Skillcapes at level 99
channel.description:
how do i do it so that on my server when i get skill of 99 it gives me the capes automatically on a dodian source?? please help fast
EDIT: also how do i make skillcapes untradeable ?

item.title: Skillcapes at level 99
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

[quote=“mLexus, post:6, topic:201363”]Here’s for the requirements:

Find Public int GetCLAttack

underneath it add this:

		if (ItemID == skillcapeid) {
			return 99;
		}

That will make the skillcape need 99 attack to weild.

So then find GetCLDefence, GetCLStrength etc, and do the same.[/quote]

ok i am very greatful for this and thanks for the help rep + if i could thanks alot

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes at level 99
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

Here’s for the requirements:

Find Public int GetCLAttack

underneath it add this:

		if (ItemID == skillcapeid) {
			return 99;
		}

That will make the skillcape need 99 attack to weild.

So then find GetCLDefence, GetCLStrength etc, and do the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes at level 99
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

On another topic

Getclattack look for that until u see alot of other codes and put the id under it and scroll down to like getclstrength until you’ve finished em all

is this for making it 99 to wield?
or is it for
getting the items at 99 skill?

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes at level 99
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

[quote=“mLexus, post:3, topic:201363”]I know how to make them untradeable.

Search for this;

	public int[] noTrade =

Add the items between the brackets, seperating with a comma.[/quote]

thanks very much for this =] i just need to know now how to make it so they cant wear the capes until level 99 of that skill could u help with that please?

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes at level 99
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

I know how to make them untradeable.

Search for this;

	public int[] noTrade =

Add the items between the brackets, seperating with a comma.
